mapper.select: SELECT a.*, CASE WHEN RIGHT(b.VALUE, 1) = 'H' THEN DATE_ADD(a.timer_value, INTERVAL CONCAT('-', REGEXP_REPLACE(b.VALUE, '[^0-9]', '')) HOUR) WHEN RIGHT(b.VALUE, 1) = 'd' THEN DATE_ADD(a.timer_value, INTERVAL CONCAT('-', REGEXP_REPLACE(b.VALUE, '[^0-9]', '')) DAY) END AS TIMER_SET_TIME FROM PM_MANAGEMENT_TIMER a INNER JOIN PM_COMMONCODE b ON a.TIMER_CODE = b.CODE WHERE timer_target_type = 'C' AND timer_target = #{character_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PM_MANAGEMENT_TIMER (timer_code, timer_target, timer_target_type, timer_value, timer_desc) VALUES (#{timer_code}, #{timer_target}, #{timer_target_type}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), ${timer_value}), #{timer_desc})
